test_zipfs module¶

test_zipfs.test_alpha()¶

Test the calculation of the alpha parameter.

The test word counts satisfy the relationship,

r = cf**(-1/alpha), where r is the rank, f the word count, and c is a constant of proportionality.

To generate test word counts for an expected alpha of

1.0, a maximum word frequency of 600 is used (i.e. c = 600 and r ranges from 1 to 600)

test_zipfs.test_filenotfounderror_handling()¶

Error handling test for a file that doesn’t exist.

test_zipfs.test_integration()¶

Test the full word count to alpha parameter workflow.

test_zipfs.test_oserror_handling()¶

Error handling test for a file that doesn’t end in ‘.csv’.

test_zipfs.test_regression()¶

Regression test for Dracula.

test_zipfs.test_word_count()¶

Test the counting of words.

The example poem is Risk, by Anaïs Nin.
